item.title: Subject Light Not Working – 5th Floor Chute Area Hi,, 25th January
item.description:
Subject Light Not Working – 5th Floor Chute Area Hi, I would like to report that the light is not working at night in the chute tube area on the 5th floor of Woodsford Building, Portland Street, London. Could you please arrange for someone to replace the light as soon as possible? Thank you for your help. Kind regards,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portland Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The kerbstones outside 121 Broadhurst Gdns., 25th January
item.description:
This is a continuation of the issue reported under 8480037. This is a health and safety hazard that needs to be fixed promptly. The stones at the edge of the pavement/road outside 121 Broadhurst Gardens require repair and replacement. Some of the stones are loose and topple over into the road, and there are a number of missing stones too. This needs to be fixed promptly as the issue has now been ongoing for almost one year. Despite repeated messages (and the previous report being closed) the issue has not been rectified. It is dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Broadhurst Gardens, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
